channel.title: Can someone tell me how to make a client
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i was just wondering if anyone knew how to make a RS2 server client?Cause i wanna learn! Either online or a download. Please post...maybe a link to a guide or vid?
Thanks, Bunnypal9
*I was told to move my post to this section...is it right?*

item.title: Can someone tell me how to make a client
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

ugh, there’s like a bunch of tutorials on how to do this… and wrong section, ask this in moparscape questions… please read the rules/stickies because they are very useful, back to reading, there’s a post like the 3rd one down that says “make your own client V.4” read into it, it’s useful…

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell me how to make a client
